content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. I was willing to pay 550 euros per month for the apartment, but Peter Schmidt was seeking a higher rent.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [550] euros per month was the agreed price, but it was not accepted by Peter Schmidt as it was not in line with his expectations.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as a 7.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator
